channel.title: Azure on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in Azure on Memo Tut

item.title: MS Learn Recommended Learning Path February Issue [Introduction to AI]
item.description: ## MS Learning's first recommended learning path![Introduction to AI] MS Learn is a Microsoft learning platform. -Introduction to Machine Learning in Python and Azure Notebooks: Jupyter Notebooks running on Python and Azure Notebooks to predict patterns and identify trends. Learning Path to learn how to leverage the libraries associated with -Explain Machine Learning and Azure Data Science Virtual Machine: Azure Data, which is a pre-configured virtual machine service for performing data science tasks in Azure.

item.title: Hands-on that automatically deploys an OCR app (Python, Flask) using Microsoft's AI service Cognitive Services to Azure with a git push trigger
item.description: The web application we will create this time is an OCR (character recognition) application that will upload an image containing characters and will recognize it and display it as a string. The app uses Python 3, Flask, Cognitive Services from Microsoft’s AI service, and more. Deployment to the cloud (Microsoft Azure) is automatic deployment of git push trigger. Thank you! This OCR app is made by Microsoft engineer Christopher Harrison.
